--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Adrienne B <abortree@...> wrote:
>
> Y=
es, wow.. I don't know what to say. I've belonged to the group for 3-4
> da=
ys. Your reputation and experience/experiments were the main reason and I

 learned afterwards of the others with experience. I can only apologize if
=

 Sorry it's been so wearing on you. Hope you find what you're looking for.

ith

nt. There

else. Now, I
> > can sympatize with Richard Roberts!

 continue, as there are a number of box and paranormal

t are more than happy to tell everyone what this stuff

w it works.
